name: Next.js Cache-Control immutable ヘッダ
description: 静的アセット向けにimmutableを返すmiddleware雛形。

files.template:
import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
export function middleware(){ const res = NextResponse.next(); res.headers.set('cache-control','public, max-age=31536000, immutable'); return res; }
